article.title: Harris Assigned to U.S. Air Force Headquarters

tags.tag: U.S. Air Force Office of the Deputy Chief of Staff for Strategic Plans and Programs

article.text: Brig. Gen. Jerry D. Harris Jr., USAF, has been assigned as director of programs, Office of the Deputy Chief of Staff for Strategic Plans and Programs, Headquarters U.S. Air Force, Pentagon, Washington, D.C.
